doc:
Margaret Dumont https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaret_Dumont 0 Margaret Dumont (October 20, 1882 – March 6, 1965) was an American stage and film actress. She is best remembered as the comic foil to the Marx Brothers in seven of their films. Groucho Marx called her "practically the fifth Marx brother". Margaret_Dumont ( October_20_,_1882 – March_6_,_1965 ) was an_American_stage_and_film_actress . She is_best_remembered as the_comic_foil to the_Marx_Brothers in seven of their_films . Groucho_Marx called her " practically the_fifth_Marx_brother_" .
